knimeNode.name: Assisted Table Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Template-assisted creation of tables within KNIME.

intro.p: This node allows the creation of a new data table using a dynamically generated user interface for the column value input. The column names and types of the new table are pre-configured with a RGG template.

fullDescription.option: Gives access to the R script after adaptation by the GUI.
Gives access to the RGG template.
Generates a temporary webpage showing an overview of all available templates.
Description explains the data table to generate. Source displays the underlying RGG template.
Loads the GUI (alternatively, you can double-click on the template).
